ocular.sclera: Erythematous, right pupil nonreactive to light
ocular.other: Bilateral scleral thinning, bilateral scleritis, cell grades of 2+ in the anterior chamber and 3+ in the vitreous

neurological.clonus: Two beats of clonus on dorsiflexion of ankles

oral.ulcers: Multiple aphthous ulcers on buccal mucosa and inner lips, linear ulcers on tongue edges

skin.palms: Erythematous rash with desquamation and healing fissures
skin.legs: Erythematous maculopapular rash with scaled and scabbed lesions

relevant_findings.joints: No erythema, tenderness, or warmth noted
